Wahai Para Bankir, Jokowi Tanya Kapan Bunga Kredit Turun?
07 Nov 2019, 00:38 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Danang Sugianto

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) kemarin menghadiri pertemuan tahunan perbankan nasional Indonesia Banking Expo 2019. Dalam acara itu Jokowi justru mengungkapkan sedikit kekesalannya.Di depan para pelaku industri perbankan, Jokowi menyinggung soal suku bunga kredit yang tak kunjung turun. Padahal suku bunga acuan Bank Indonesia (BI) sudah beberapa kali diturunkan."Saya mengajak untuk memikirkan serius menurunkan suku bunga kredit," kata Jokowi, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Jokowi bilang, perbankan di negara lain sudah banyak yang menurunkan suku bunga kredit perbankannya. Hal itu sebagai tindak lanjut bank sentral negara lain yang menurunkan suku bunga acuannya.Menurut Jokowi, bank sentral juga sudah beberapa kali menurunkan suku bunga acuan BI 7 days reverse repo rate sebanyak 100 basis poin (bps) menjadi 5%.Dengan langkah tersebut, Mantan Wali Kota Solo ini menilai harus segera ditindaklanjuti oleh perbankan nasional dengan juga menurunkan bunga kredit."Masa negara lain sudah turun, turun, turun, kita BI rate sudah turun, banknya belum. Saya tunggu. Tepuk tangan berarti setuju, catat lagi," ungkap Jokowi.Apa jawaban bankir?Lanjut ke halaman berikutnya >>> (das/ang)

O Bankers, Jokowi Asks When Will Loan Interest Decline?
Nov 7 2019, 00:38 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Danang Sugianto

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) attended the 2019 Indonesia Banking Expo national banking annual meeting yesterday. In that event Jokowi actually expressed a bit of his frustration. In front of the banking industry players, Jokowi alluded to the issue of lending rates that would not go down. Whereas the Bank Indonesia (BI) benchmark interest rate has been lowered several times. "I invite to think seriously about lowering lending rates," Jokowi said, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Jokowi said, there were many banks in other countries. reduce its bank credit interest rates. This was a follow-up to the central banks of other countries which lowered their benchmark interest rates. According to Jokowi, the central bank had also several times reduced the benchmark BI 7 days reverse repo rate by 100 basis points (bps) to 5%. With this step, the former The Mayor of Solo assessed that it must be immediately followed up by national banks by also lowering credit interest. "The period of other countries has gone down, down, down, we BI rate has gone down, the bank has not. I am waiting. Applause means agree, record again," said Jokowi. What is the banker's answer?
